extendedInfo.description: Many Android devices don't indicate battery level in a way that easily represents the amount remaining.Awesome Battery Indicator draws a unintrusive green bar across the top of your screen representing battery level in a way that does not require Root privileges.Best part? It's free! The size of the indicator corresponds to the battery percentage remaining, in relation to your screen width.This is by far one of the best solutions for displaying your battery usage on your Android device. Much less intrusive, and easier to view and access than Widgets or notifications. Future updates will include:-Color customization *Done in 2.0!*-Position customization-Ability to draw the battery percentage value after the bar * Done in 2.1!*-Color changing depending on battery level-Hiding the color bar when certain apps are opened (Example: Hide when certain games are being played)-Sizing *Done in 2.0!*

reviews.title: Nice app......But!
reviews.comment: If you have this app running on an Asus Nexus 7,you will not be able to side load APK files until you disable it! I had to go through all my apps to find out why I was unable to install apps  (other than through playstore),to find out what the problem was! Hope this saves someone some time,I know it was incredibly frustrating for me!
reviews.author: Michael Kane

reviews.title: Most certainly awesome
reviews.comment: New update corrected auto start. Battery level at a glance great job.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Photon,  I am country recording artist  Craig Michael Curtice of CURTICE/MARKLEY And you may use my name because you\'re app is sweet. thank you for the good work. also just so you know my phone is rooted if that helps in your development process.

reviews.title: Pleasant surprise
reviews.comment: Works like it should, the design and the adjustabilty of color makes this app very cool.  Looking forward to your next update.  Thanks

reviews.title: Best battery  indicator ever
reviews.comment: It shows the battery status every time running every app its the best thing about it....only problem is that when i remove my phone from charging..i had to restart it..but no worries i hope bnc will sort it out soon... highly recommended app......doesnt take much space either...go for it...

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Simple, but works VERY well

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: I actually thought this was redundant since I already used a batt indicator but I love that this stays on top so I always know at a glance when I\'m playing games. Thanks, great idea but just a little confusing when I was configuring it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well done
reviews.comment: Works as intended! Not wasting resources.  The only thing: doesn\'t autostart on Samsung Galaxy S2 i9100 ICS or CyanogendMod 9 (ICS), however works properly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: @theUsualSuspexx so far so good
reviews.comment: Who? What? Who? Rate the app don\'t drop names...or lack there of. U wanna jock the dev there\'s an email addy for that, flame on if that\'s ur thing. As for the app so far so good, color change is a nice bonus. Nice miui touch with the bar, as long as it. Don\'t drain my battery in itself or give me some cyber std ad ill be back with the 5th star
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Niice!
reviews.comment: Great app. Works well except for does not auto start sometimes on Galaxy S3 JB
reviews.author: Stephen Timms

reviews.title: The images are tricky
reviews.comment: A good app, but the images that are being displayed are showing up another icon in replacement of the default battery icon on the OS (on the right). It can be tricky (and really disappointing) to find out that the app is not what you exactly saw on the sample images.  Dear devs: If you are showing an example of a battery icon on the notification bar, please don\'t mislead people using another icon in replacement of the stock one on the right.
reviews.author: Gonzalo Foligna

reviews.title: That is awesome !
reviews.comment: Brilliant idea ! Very ceative . Proudly deserve 5 stars :) Just hope you could make hide after full screen app or video/ image browsing. keep up the good work. Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best app on the market
reviews.comment: Can\'t live without it. It\'s much better than the default battery icon which can be really inaccurate at a glance. The only problem is that it causes the install button on a .apk to become unelectable without stopping this app first.

reviews.title: Position of % display
reviews.comment: Position of % display is in the middle of the status bar and when the number of others icons increases, they come over it. So please add an option to display the % at left most.
